mapper.select: select a.catenum catenum, catename, catesort, cateimg, mcatenum, mcatename, mcatesort from category a join mcategory b on a.catenum = b.catenum order by catesort, mcatesort

select ordernum, od.productnum productnum, productname, mc.mcatenum mcatenum, orderquantity, to_char(orderconfirm, 'YYYY-MM-DD') orderconfirm, orderprice, mc.mcatename mcatename from (select ordernum, a.productnum, productname, b.mcatenum, orderquantity, orderconfirm, orderprice, userid from (select ordernum,productnum,orderquantity,orderconfirm,orderprice from orderdetail) a join product b on a.productnum = b.productnum ) od join mcategory mc on od.mcatenum = mc.mcatenum where userid='${userid}'
and od.productnum in
${item}
and orderconfirm between #{startCalendarDataValue} and #{endCalendarDataValue} order by orderconfirm asc, ordernum asc
